title: Biden Team to Counter Tech Espionage Unveils Cases Involving China and Russia
description: A new division set up by the government to pursue sanctions evasion and technology espionage announced arrests of individuals with ties to foreign governments.

title: OpenAI’s Sam Altman Urges A.I. Regulation in Senate Hearing
description: The tech executive and lawmakers agreed that new A.I. systems must be regulated. Just how that would happen is not yet clear.

title: As EV Sales Pick up Pace, Electric Commercial Fleets Lag
description: Passenger cars dominate the electric vehicle market, but light delivery trucks could benefit from the cost savings and range E.V.s offer.

title: Microsoft Says New AI Shows Signs of Human Reasoning
description: A provocative paper from researchers at Microsoft claims A.I. technology shows the ability to understand the way people do. Critics say those scientists are kidding themselves.

title: Tesla Changed a Deadline for Investor Proposals, Angering Activists
description: Some shareholders saw the automaker’s decision to move up the deadline by two months as a way to suppress criticism during the company’s annual meeting on Tuesday.
